    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalCLIClientMenu(java.io.InputStream inputStream, java.io.OutputStream output)
      Class that writes a ClientMenu specifically for the local gaming There's also a PrintStream for writing on the matchlog.txt file

    • Method Detail

      • writeMessage

        public void writeMessage(java.lang.String message,
                boolean writeOnMatchLog)
        Function that is called when a message is communicated to the user's console. If the flag writeOnMatchLog is true, it writes this information on the matchlog.txt file.
        Overrides:
        writeMessage in class ClientMenu
        Parameters:
        message - String to be written, writeOnMatchLog boolean flag

      • ShowIntro

        public void ShowIntro()
        Function that is called when the main menu is shown. Provides a list of commands an waits for the user's input.
        Overrides:
        ShowIntro in class ClientMenu
        Parameters:
        nothing -

      • ShowStartMenu

        public GameInfo ShowStartMenu()
        Function that is called when the user is configuring a match. It gets the info of the match by calling getGameInfo and, to ensure confirmation, waits for the user's to say START to start the match with the chosen settings, or RESTART to select new ones. If any command is wrong, a message is shown.
        Overrides:
        ShowStartMenu in class ClientMenu
        Parameters:
        nothing -
        Returns:
        GameInfo with all the chosen settings of the match.

      • tooMuchItemMenu

        public java.util.List<Item> tooMuchItemMenu(TooMuchItemsEvent event)
                                     throws UseItemException
        Function that is called when the menu of TooMuchItems is shown. Gets the items list out of the TooMuchItemsEvent. Displays a list of all the items and when an item is chosen, waits for the user to eliminate it or use it. If it uses it, it launches an exception.
        Overrides:
        tooMuchItemMenu in class ClientMenu
        Parameters:
        TooMuchItemsEvent - containing the list of ownedItems plus the item picked up
        Returns:
        updated list of items with the chosen one removed.
        Throws:
        UseItemException

      • ShowPlayerMenu

        public UserInput ShowPlayerMenu(Player player)
        Function that is called when the menu of Player's function is shown. Shows the available actions to the user and wairs for an input. Most functions are shown only if the user has the permissions (e.g. attack is shown after a move). Returns the userinput to the controller.
        Overrides:
        ShowPlayerMenu in class ClientMenu
        Parameters:
        Player - requesting the action.
        Returns:
        userInput of the request chosen.

      • ShowNoiseInAnySectorMenu

        public void ShowNoiseInAnySectorMenu(Player player)
        Function that is called when the menu of NoiseInAnySector is shown. Waits for the user to insert a sector and checks if it's valid. Writes the output to the user.
        Overrides:
        ShowNoiseInAnySectorMenu in class ClientMenu
        Parameters:
        Player - requesting the action.

      • ShowSpotLightMenu

        public java.lang.String ShowSpotLightMenu()
        Function that is called when the menu of the Spotlight Card is shown. Waits for the user to insert a sector and checks if it's valid. Writes the output to the user and returns the sector chosen. It will be used by the caller to show all the players near and into that sector.
        Overrides:
        ShowSpotLightMenu in class ClientMenu
        Parameters:
        nothing -
        Returns:
        String with the sector id
